paragraph.materialsCitation:
Holotype male with labels: (1) printed with handwritten inscriptions on white label: “ Tibet Medog / NO: 900 / Chinese Academy of Sciences ”; (2) printed with handwritten inscriptions on white label: “19 80.IV.28 / collector
Jianyi Wu
”; (3) printed with handwritten inscriptions on red label: “ TYPE /
Alliopsis
/
heterochaeta
/ Fan et Wu ”.

subSubSection.paragraph: Preservation: pinned; specimen intact.

Jianyi Wu
”; (3) printed with handwritten inscriptions on red label: “ PARATYPE /
Alliopsis
/
heterochaeta
/ Fan et Wu ”
.
Preservation: pinned; specimens intact.
